New Records: Jason Foley earned his 19th save of the season
Key Match Events: Jace Jung's 10-pitch walk led to Spencer Torkelson's home run
Kenta Maeda dodged trouble after a visit from catcher Jake Rogers
Beau Brieske threw a 98.6 mph fastball past Logan O'Hoppe for strike three
Post-Match Reflections: Spencer Torkelson emphasized the importance of sticking with what the team has and keeping playing hard, having fun, and pulling for one another
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Detroit Tigers have won six in a row and 13 of their past 16 games, and are now only 4 1/2 games back from a wild-card spot with 28 games to play
Others: The team's improbable charge back into contention has made baseball in Detroit fun and meaningful again
